articles.content:
The UK medical regulator says that out of 30 people who suffered rare blood clots after receiving the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine, seven have died.
The British acknowledgement of deaths comes as seve… [+4633 chars]
articles.description: A number of European countries have paused the rollout of the AstraZeneca vaccine or limited its use to older people, with the European Medicines Agency (EMA) expected to announce updated advice on 7 April.
articles.title: Seven deaths in UK linked to AstraZeneca jab as some European countries scale back rollout - SBS News
